snippet.title: Shrug Island -The Meeting, Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Itch.io ( https://bit.ly/2HMYkop) and Steam ( https://bit.ly/2ENcQtO ) for PC and Mac. Signup for our mailing list ( https://bit.ly/2EMQKYy )

Shrug Island - The Meeting -  is a warmly wistful adventure in a shapeshifting world, a playful celebration of music, mystery and nature’s dances, a game about reconnecting puzzles of friendship and hidden pasts. Available on May 9, 2018

More on:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/tinyredcamel
Facebook - https://facebook.com/shrugworlds
https://www.shrugisland.com


The wonderful singer in our release trailer, and in the game, is Lukkif - http://julliehjetland.dk/
